effect.x_y: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

short_effect.x_y: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it’s Dark.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it’s Dark.

flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.
flavor_text.x_y: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.
